Mobiles.name: POCO M2(Slate Blue)64GB
Mobiles.Warranty: 1 Year for Handset, 6 Months for Accessories
Mobiles.Description: Style, performance, and innovation - the Poco M2 brings together all these aspects with its 16.58 cm (6.53) FHD+ 1080p Full Screen Display, MediaTek Helio G80 Octa-core processor, a quad-camera setup, and an 8 MP selfie camera. What’s more, this phone is also highly durable, thanks to P2i protection and Corning Gorilla Glass 3.
Mobiles.Product Description: Pixel Perfect Display With the 16.58 cm (6.53) FHD+ 1080p Full Screen Display with 394 PPI, you can watch your favourite characters come alive on the screen with accurate details and lifelike clarity.
Mobiles.Product Description2: Shift Gears Seamlessly Multitasking and app switching is so swift and seamless that you can switch from attending zoom calls and browsing the web to gaming online effortlessly.
Mobiles.Product Description3: Powerful Processor Powered by the MediaTek Helio G80 Octa-core CPU and 6 GB of RAM, the Poco M2 provides an optimised performance for all your needs.
Mobiles.Product Description4: A Phone That Doesn’t Quit on You   The Poco M2’s comes with 10 W fast charging and a massive 5000 mAh battery which provides up to 26 days of standby time, about 25 hours of video playback, and up to 12 hours of gaming.
Mobiles.Product Description5: Connectivity on All Fronts The Poco M2 supports USB Type C, IR Blaster, and a headphone jack, providing no dearth of connectivity options.
Mobiles.Question1: Can i play freefire in ultra mode graphics ?
Mobiles.Question2: Is it have finger print scanner lock and face unlock system?
Mobiles.Question3: Does POCO M2 have Screen Recording option with Audio?
